DOC.brief_summary: This open , randomize , comparative study use rhCG ( Ovidrel ) induction final follicle maturation early luteinization Chinese female subject undergo IVF ET .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Using Recombinant Human Chorionic Gonadotrophin ( rhCG , Ovidrel® ) Induction Final Follicle Maturation Early Luteinization Chinese Women Undergoing Vitro Fertilization Embryo Transfer ( IVF/ET )
DOC.detailed_description: This open , randomize , comparative multicentric , phase III study evaluate safety efficacy rhCG comparison urinary hCG induction final follicle maturation early luteinization 200 Chinese female subject undergoing superovulation . The study organize outpatient basis subject undergo assisted reproductive technology ( ART ) . All subject underwent pituitary down- regulation per center 's normal practice prior stimulation multiple follicular development . The subject randomize 2 group . One group receive rhCG 250mcg group receive urinary hCG ( Profasi® ) 10,000IU . Each subject group receive single injection hCG follicular development judge adequate . Oocytes retrieve 36-38 hour hCG injection fertilize vitro . Not 3 embryos 2 blastocyst replace . Progesterone administer daily accord center 's normal practice , start oocyte pick continue negative pregnancy test first 3 week pregnancy subject pregnant . The subject follow treatment outcome ( negative pregnancy test pregnancy ) record . A phase I sub-study evaluate pharmacokinetics single subcutaneous ( s.c. ) administration rhCG conduct 24 healthy Chinese female subject China . The subject randomize 3 group . Each group receive single dose 250mcg 500mcg 750 mcg rhCG . Blood sample collect predetermined interval injection . Human chorionic gonadotropin serum level measure Serono MAIAclone vitro bioassay MA-10 . Safety assess incidence severity adverse event ( AEs ) , include multiple pregnancy ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) significant change laboratory value .
DOC.criteria: Infertility regular ovulatory menstrual cycle ; Early luteal phase serum level : FSH≤ 10IU/l LH≤ 10IU/l PRL≤ 30ng/ml T≤ 50pg/ml Haematology , blood chemistry , urinalysis normal Both ovary present < 3 previous ART cycle , ART cycle 2 menstrual cycle With poor response gonadotrophin stimulation , ≤3 oocytes collect previous IVF cycle Any medical condition may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug . Had previous severe ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) A body mass index ( BMI ) > 25 kg/m2 Any contraindication pregnant and/or carry pregnancy term Extrauterine pregnancy within last 3 month A clinically significant systemic disease Known infection Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis B C virus Abnormal gynaecological bleeding undetermined origin Known allergy hypersensitivity human gonadotrophin preparation Simultaneous participation another clinical trial
